title: Report Card Day
itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
itunes:summary:
This week on #TheFriendZone, we work through a self-audit. If we were to place your family, friends, romantic partners and co-workers into a room to hear their perceptions/perspectives of you, the good and the bad, what would they say? And how much of what they think of you aligns with what you think of yourself? 

Black Business of the Week - https://ruckerroots.com

Wellness Segment - Sea Moss & Centella Calming Gel Toner - https://ixorabb.com/products/sea-moss-centella-calming-gel-toner?variant=41344867729603
